MainLog.Includes_Description: If set, matching log statements matching are written to the log. Exclusion has precedence over inclusion.
MainLog.Excludes_Description: If set, matching log statements are ignored. Exclusion has precedence over inclusion.

Logging.Logs_Description: Allows to define logs, the `key` specifies the log file path relative to `.modtek`.
